==Wish Details==
===Duration===
* 2025-05-07 11:00:00 UTC+8 &mdash; TBA<!--YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS-->

===Summary===
* In this event wish, the event-exclusive 5-star character {{Wish Item|Escoffier}} will get a huge drop-rate boost!
* During this event wish, the 4-star character<!--s--> {{Wish Item|Ifa}} will receive a huge drop-rate boost!

* For information about rates, see [[Wish]]es.
